content.text:
# Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic–Syria relations

SADR-Syrian relations refers to the current and historical relations between the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic (SADR) and Syria. Syria officially recognized SADR on 15 April 1980.
History
Syria has historically provided political support to the Polisario, a Sahrawi group fighting against Morocco.
See also
*Foreign relations of Syria
*Foreign relations of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
*International recognition of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
*Polisario Front
